argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | unitinvcl.1 | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 2 |  | unitinvcl.2 | |- I = ( invr ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_unitgrp | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) e. Grp ) |
| 5 | 1, 3 | #P_unitgrpbas | |- U = ( Base ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_invrfval | |- I = ( invg ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_grpinvcl | |- ( ( ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) e. Grp /\ X e. U ) -> ( I ` X ) e. U ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U ) -> ( I ` X ) e. U ) |
